title: United Kingdom : largest import commodities 2018
yAxis: Value of imports in million GBP
summary: The United Kingdom Month in the import commodities was Month Crude_materials , who made 152.9 imports .
The most Kingdom Month was Chemicals , with just 95.8 imports .

In second place was Month Animal_and_vegetable_oils_and_fats with 112.9 imports ; third place went to Month Fuels with 152.9 imports ; fourth place went to Month Unspecified_goods with 95.8 imports and fifth place went to Month Marieral_manufactures , who was 107.2 imports .

data.Month: Animal and vegetable oils and fats

gold: This statistic shows the 30 largest import commodities of the United Kingdom ( UK ) in 2018 in million GBP . This ranges from machinery and oil to food and chemicals . In this year , the largest imported commodity was fuel , with approximately 152 million British pounds , followed by animal and vegetable oils and crude materials with almost 113 million British pounds each .
